EL-001.displayName: Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex
EL-001.description: A powerful nighttime serum that visibly reduces the look of multiple signs of aging for a smoother, younger, more radiant look.

EL-002.description: A 24-hour, long-wearing, matte foundation that provides flawless, full coverage and feels lightweight and comfortable on the skin.

EL-003.description: A multi-action creme that significantly improves firmness, density, and elasticity for a more lifted look and firmer feel.

EL-004.description: A high-intensity lip color that saturates lips with statement-making, wearable color designed to flatter all skintones.

EL-005.displayName: Sumptuous Extreme Lash Multiplying Volume Mascara
EL-005.description: Creates outrageous volume, lift, and curves for an audacious, false-lash effect. Lashes seem to multiply and magnify.

CL-001.description: An oil-free gel-cream moisturizer that provides deep, lasting hydration for up to 100 hours, leaving skin plump and glowing.

CL-002.description: A transparent pigment that merges with the unique, natural tone of your lips to create a shade that's all your own. Sheer, glossy, and lightweight.

CL-003.displayName: Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm
CL-003.description: A silky, lightweight makeup remover that quickly dissolves tenacious eye and face makeups, as well as sunscreens.

LM-001.description: An ultra-rich cream that delivers healing moisture, daily protection, and energized repair. It helps soothe dryness and irritation for a renewed, youthful look.

LM-002.description: A potent barrier serum with Concentrated Miracle Broth™ that strengthens, stabilizes, and visibly soothes the skin against daily irritants.

LM-003.description: A hydrating eye cream that helps to reduce the look of dark circles, lines, and wrinkles for a brighter, healthier-looking eye area.

MAC-001.description: A modern foundation that combines a natural matte finish and medium-to-full buildable coverage with broad spectrum UVA/UVB SPF 15 protection.

MAC-002.description: An iconic, rich, and creamy matte lipstick formula with high color payoff in a no-shine matte finish. Available in timeless shades like Ruby Woo and Velvet Teddy.

MAC-003.description: A continuously buildable, clump-resistant mascara that stacks on infinite layers of volume and length. Customize your lash look from natural to next-level.

LL-001.description: An iconic, unisex fragrance that captures the spirit of the American West. A defining cult classic with notes of cardamom, iris, sandalwood, and leather.

LL-002.description: A hypnotic and unique musk scent composed of ambroxan and blended with twelve other ingredients such as jasmine and moss. Creates an addictive, personal scent.

LL-003.description: An ode to the noble leaf and the craft that surrounds it. A sophisticated scent with notes of black tea, fig, bergamot, and cedar wood that is both fresh and addictive.
